name: Snow problem (itch) (RikSnoep)
description:
(Please note that this video doubled as a school assignment, so at the end there's a little bit of information that's not relevant to regular players)

Spring is approaching fast, but there's so much you still want to do!

Join the snowman on a quest to complete his bucketlist, and find out how the other snowmen in snow village view their impending doom. 

Music credit: Stardew valley
